ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course is an advanced course, and very useful for PhD students especially for the ones who want to pursue programming languages related research. However, I think the course is not suitable for Master students and undergraduate students. Thus, I will recommend the course to PhD students whose research interests are programming languages and formal methods, and the undergraduate students who want to do some programming languages related researches in the future.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: For me, all the papers deepen my knowledge in the field of programming languages very well. From the course, I read many useful papers and almost all of them are from top conferences in the area.
